# Colophon {.unnumbered}

This book was typeset with [Quarto](https://quarto.org) {{< version >}} using the default fonts.

**Technical Notes**

The following tools and technologies were used in the preparation of this book:

-   Bash: Unix shell used for task automation
-   Black: Python code formatter
-   CotEditor: Lightweight text editor for quick edits
-   macOS: Principal development operating system
-   Pandoc: Document converter from Markdown to HTML and PDF
-   Positron: Primary integrated development environment for the project
-   Python: Primary language for computations
-   Quarto: Open-source scientific and technical publishing system
-   Ruff: Fast Python linter and code formatter
-   TeX Live: Full LaTeX distribution used for PDF rendering via Quarto
-   uv: Modern Python package manager and resolver
-   Zotero: Reference management system, integrated with Pandoc for citations
